players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed last night. So Charlie is the only suspect. Vote Charlie."
You: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is the mafia. Vote them out."
Diana: "..."
Charlie: "I killed Bob because he was mafia. Diana may be mistaken. Vote her."
You: "Charlie is mafia. Bob was a villager, not mafia. Diana’s investigation confirms. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed last night. So Charlie is the only suspect. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is the mafia. Vote them out."
Diana: "..."
You: "I killed Bob because he was mafia. Diana may be mistaken. Vote her."
Alice: "Charlie is mafia. Bob was a villager, not mafia. Diana’s investigation confirms. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Bob was killed last night. So Charlie is the only suspect. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "I agree with Diana. Charlie is the mafia. Vote them out."
Charlie: "I killed Bob because he was mafia. Diana may be mistaken. Vote her."
Alice: "Charlie is mafia. Bob was a villager, not mafia. Diana’s investigation confirms. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
